course_description: Learn Python from scratch: install, code, debug, and build real apps with confidence in just one course.
course_overview: This hands-on course takes absolute beginners from zero to productive Python developer. You will set up a modern coding environment, master core syntax, control flow, functions, and data structures, then apply skills to automate tasks, manipulate files, and create simple applications. Interactive labs, quizzes, and mini-projects reinforce every concept, ensuring you can read, write, test, and debug Python programs independently.
target_audience: Aspiring programmers, data analysts, scientists, and professionals with no prior coding experience who want a solid Python foundation.
prerequisites: Ability to install software on your machine
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and Visual Studio Code on Windows, macOS, or Linux
Explain and apply variables, data types, operators, and expressions to solve arithmetic and string problems
Write programs using sequential, conditional, and iterative control structures to implement algorithms
Design, document, and invoke reusable functions with parameters and return values
Create, manipulate, and iterate over lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets to manage collections of data
Read from and write to text files, handle exceptions, and validate user input in command-line applications
Test and debug Python scripts using print debugging, assertions, and unit tests to ensure correctness
